name: Kline et al. v. Harrisburg et al., Appellants

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Kline et al. v. Harrisburg et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Chief Justice Maxey,
On ttis Twenty-fiftt day of June, 1949, it is ordered ttat tte decree of tte court below in the above entitled case be affirmed on tte opinion of Judge Robebt E. Woodside. Tte appellant will pay its own costs and tte appellees will pay tteir own costs.
opinions.author: Mr. Chief Justice Maxey,

attorneys: Spencer G. Hall, City Solicitor, witt tim James S. Bowman, Assistant City Solicitor and Shelley é Reynolds, for appellants.
George H. Hafer, witt tim George Ross Hull, Arthur H. Hull, William H. Wood, Robert L. Rubendall and Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Kline et al. v. Harrisburg et al., Appellants.
Argued June 24, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Spencer G. Hall, City Solicitor, witt tim James S. Bowman, Assistant City Solicitor and Shelley é Reynolds, for appellants.
George H. Hafer, witt tim George Ross Hull, Arthur H. Hull, William H. Wood, Robert L. Rubendall and Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellees.
June 25, 1949:
